name: HDHomeRun Config
summary: A GUI for configuration of HDHomeRun devices
description:
This package supports the Silicon Dust HDHomeRun. The HDHomeRun is a networked, two tuner digital TV tuner compatible with MythTV, SageTV, and VLC.

This utility can be used for: * Discovering your tuner location and name * Gathering tuner settings * Setting tuner setting * Performing scans * Performing firmware upgrades
